title: Peter Barry (equestrian)
text:
Peter Barry (born 17 June 1956 in <a href="Cologne%2C%20Germany">Cologne, Germany</a>) is a <a href="Canadian%20Equestrian%20Team">Canadian Equestrian Team</a> athlete. He competed at the <a href="2012%20Summer%20Olympics">2012 Summer Olympics</a> where he was eliminated in the <a href="Equestrian%20at%20the%202012%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Individual%20eventing">individual</a> and finished 13th in the <a href="Equestrian%20at%20the%202012%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Team%20eventing">team eventing</a> competitions.
Barry also represented Canada at the <a href="2014%20FEI%20World%20Equestrian%20Games">2014 World Equestrian Games</a> in <a href="Normandy">Normandy</a>, <a href="France">France</a>, where he achieved 6th position in team and 42nd position in individual eventing.
